title: Apple's M4 Mac mini with 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD dips to $929
description: Save $70 on Apple's latest Mac mini with an M4 chip and upgrade to 24GB of memory with this exclusive deal.Save on Apple's M4 Mac mini with 24GB RAM.The M4 Mac mini makes a great addition to an Apple setup thanks to its compact form factor and power of the M4 chip. And with a price point that just got even more aggressive, you can get a whole lot of machine for under $1,000.For a limited time, AppleInsider readers can grab the exclusive price of $929 for the M4 Mac mini with an upgrade to 24GB of memory and 512GB of storage (the latter which can be expanded further through the use of an external SSD). author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Save $70 on Apple's latest Mac mini with an M4 chip and upgrade to 24GB of memory with this exclusive deal.

The M4 Mac mini makes a great addition to an Apple setup thanks to its compact form factor and power of the M4 chip. And with a price point that just got even more aggressive, you can get a whole lot of machine for under $1,000. html:
Save $70 on Apple's latest Mac mini with an M4 chip and upgrade to 24GB of memory with this exclusive deal.

The M4 Mac mini makes a great addition to an Apple setup thanks to its compact form factor and power of the M4 chip. And with a price point that just got even more aggressive, you can get a whole lot of machine for under $1,000.

For a limited time, AppleInsider readers can grab the exclusive price of $929 for the M4 Mac mini with an upgrade to 24GB of memory and 512GB of storage (the latter which can be expanded further through the use of an external SSD).

Buy for $929

Normally retailing for $1,099, the $70 discount is available when you shop through the pricing links above or in our M4 Mac mini Price Guide from a laptop or desktop computer.

B&H, which has been in business since 1973, is also including free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. to get the all-in-one desktop to you fast.

Payboo cardholders can take advantage of an instant sales tax refund in qualifying states as well to help put money back in your pocket. You can learn more and sign up on B&H's Payboo page.

For even more deals on hardware, be sure to check out our Apple Price Guides.
